form.name: form1

div.span: School Closure Issued by Governor DeWine

On Monday, April 20, 2020, Governor Dewine announced that Ohio schools will remain closed for the rest of the 2019 - 2020 school year. The Geneva School District will continue to provide education and meal service during the closure. Updated educational plans will be shared on the website and by your child's teacher or school. Thank you for your support!

a.title:
The Geneva Area City Schools Board of Education will meet in special session

on Wednesday, April 29, 2020.  The Board meeting will start at 7:00 p.m.  The meeting will be held by video conference as authorized by Amended Substitute House Bill 197.  The new law, effective on March 27, 2020, allows public bodies such as boards of education to conduct their meetings using telephone conferences, video conferences, or other similar technologies.

 

Meeting will be conducted using Zoom video conferencing.  Meeting website, meeting ID and password will be posted on the districts website-main page under District News (Online Board of Education Meeting).  If you do not have access to the website, contact Mr. Kujala, Superintendent at eric.kujala@genevaschools.org for meeting details. 

Starting at: 7:00 pm

br.span: Wednesday, April 29, 2020
Friday, May 1, 2020
